column5: Sorry, I'm very busy with school, and I've been fishing too much, so no time for a thorough report.  Friday  Kelli and I headed out to Cooch to try some smallies.  Figured the limestones would be on... wrong.  But about a km north of the stones they sure were, a few boats out there, even some largies.           Saturday  Cal and I braved the winds to fish the north end of Simcoe.  We chose the north end to stay out of the wind, I dont usually like that area, but the dang roughest ride of my life from Barrie to almost Orillia was certainly worth while.  We dragged tubes and dropshotted in 18-30 feet for pig smallies.  Even got a tagged fish.    Sunday  Had a tournament on Gloucester Pool.  Our goal was to get a limit of smallies, then look for a big largemouth.  We did what we wanted and weighed 14 pounds.  Good e nough for 5th place!
nice photos.  That second last photo has some monster smallies in it
Man, those are some huge smallies!
congrats on some nice bass
great fish and congrats on fifth in the tourney
nice looking bass and congrats on the tourney.
WOW !!!!!!! man they are some HUGE SMALLIES..  ..awesome pics as well,you sure had them dialed in thats for sure.  ...cheers
That's just great. I come in from a night of being skunked by the smallies and have to look at those pics. Totally makes my day. All the same WTG  JF
thanks guys, i had a blast this weekend.
Wow!! some serious HOGS there!
Great looking fish, Congrats.

What only 4 ????????????? LOL Those are some sweet pigs Steve. I have to get out there,but work is nuts.  WTG  1KM north? Didint think you could go any further north.LOL  Like to spend a day on the water with Gerry. Seems like a super guy to fish with.
we had 5... but kinda hard to hold 2 five pounders in one hand
and brian, north of the stones, there's like 5 km of bowling alley haha
some real nice fish!
Great stuff, some real beauties for sure and congrats on the 5th place finish.

You dont say.Now you have told the WHOLE WORLD.LOL  Great place to sight fish eh Steve. Also the area in which makes you so frustrated when you can see them and they see you.LOL  So tell me,where in the Bay here did you let those fatties go?????????????????  LOL
WOW!! Those are some really nice bass! I also seen one of your pictures up at the BPS picture board!
nice dude  i forget how they fight lol  congrats
wow bud great report! i see you and gerry did well lol. i was talking to him at the shop the other day and he was saying it was a good day   .
